channel.title: Why does the total balance in my wallet and on the Radix Explorer show large changes between refreshes?
channel.description:
For some users the total balance shown in their wallet or on the Radix Explorer increases and decreases between refreshes - even when no transactions have taken place.
This is a known issue with the current Radix Archive nodes that will be resolved when the new Core-Api version of Radix is released in the New Year.
